Package org.jlinalg.optimise

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Optimiser<RE extends IRingElement<RE>>
    The contract for an optimiser.
    Target<RE extends IRingElement<RE>>
    This interface is to be used in combination with Optimiser.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    RandomGradientDescent<RESIDUAL extends IRingElement<RESIDUAL>>
    An implementation of an optimiser: Among the parameters, one is randomly choosen and then this dimension is searched along the gradient with a decreasing step size if the residual does not decreases. if the residual increases, the step size is increased somewhat.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Optimiser.State
    the states of the optimiser
  • Error Summary 
    Error Description
    OptimiserError
    The error to risen if the optimiser encounters problems.
